sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; function App() { return (
{/* Navbar */}
Advertise Host Signage
{/* Hero Section */}

Grow Your Business

With Our Solution

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod.

{/* Features Section */}

Features

Why businesses choose VYPA to power their digital signage.

{/* Feature 1 */}

Remote Management

Control all your screens from anywhere. Schedule, update, and publish content in real time.

{/* Feature 2 */}

Multi-location Sync

Easily manage screens across branches or cities with centralized control.

{/* Feature 3 */}

Ad Campaign Insights

Get performance data and proof-of-play for all client campaigns.

); } export default App;
